Reason: The configuration option 'memtable_allocation_type' is performance-sensitive. The 'memtable_allocation_type' directly determines the type of MemtablePool to create in the createMemtableAllocatorPool method, which involves time-expensive operations such as heap and off-heap memory allocation. The choice of MemtablePool type significantly impacts memory consumption and performance at the system level, making it performance-sensitive.
